featured.text: Moreover, some people even break coral off to collect for 40 since it is so colorful and pretty.
They were then replaced by colorful glass beads, allowing for more detailed beadwork and color patterns.

definition.zh_def: 色彩繽紛的，充滿顏色的。
definition.en_def: Full of colors; bright and vivid.
definition.example: The garden was colorful with a variety of blooming flowers.
